title: Update the block production workflow to use the block V3 API by default
body:

### Description
Currently the block production have two APIs: block v2 and block v3. In the current block V3 flow, the `blinded` param (similar to the block V2 API) is hard coded and set to true. The following changes are required to make the block V3 API the default:
- [ ] Make the block production automatically choose blinded or unblinded blocks and remove the hard coded blinded param in block V3:
    - [ ] Add `builder_comparison_factor` param represents a percentage multiplier to apply to the builder's payload value when choosing between a builder payload header and a local payload. [More details in the spec PR](https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/pull/386)
    - [ ] Add `execution_payload_source` (rename execution_payload_blinded to execution_payload_builder). [Under discussion](https://github.com/ethereum/beacon-APIs/issues/387)
- [ ] Remove the deprecated block V2 methods
- [ ] Remove the `--Xblock-v3-enabled` option which is used to use block V3 apis

These are the last steps of https://github.com/Consensys/teku/issues/7779
